Dr. Muhammad Mohsin Qureshi

Data Science Enthusiast | Python Developer | Tech Explorer

Hi, I’m Mohsin, a PhD with a builder’s mindset and a passion for AI. I work end-to-end across the stack: from training machine learning models to deploying full-stack web apps. My expertise spans AI, data science, and modern software development using tools like Python, FastAPI, cloud platforms, and ML pipelines. I’ve launched my own app, handled everything from model design to DevOps, and love turning complex ideas into real, usable tech.

Leading machine learning initiatives and developing data pipelines for enterprise clients. Spearheaded the development of a recommendation system that improved user engagement by 35%.

Chosun University of Technology, South Korea March 2021 – August 2016

Designed and implemented scalable data pipelines processing 1M+ records daily. Optimized ETL processes, reducing processing time by 60%.
